## EventMap type

A map of events that can be emitted or listened for within a [ChatCoreAwsConnect](./chat-core-aws-connect.chatcoreawsconnect.md) to their associated data types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EventMap = {
    message: string;
    typing: boolean;
    close: AwsConnectEventData;
};
```
